description:
Turn your bike light into your headlamp. The Piko/Piko R Light Headband allows you to wear your super-bright Lupine bike light on your head.

  • Works with your 2016 and newer Piko and Piko R light heads
  • Top strap reduces light bounce when moving quickly – a big plus for trail running
  • In the box: Piko/Piko R Headband, FastClick battery mount and optional cable router backplate for use with 120cm extension cord (not included)
name: Lupine Blika/Piko Light Front Click Headband
